title: My screen flickeres when I sign in to lol and sometimes when i start playing
body:
HELP. Every time i log into lol my whole screen starts flickering with the league screen still intact.

Is this just my computer or something wrong with it.
There are times when it stops completely but most of the time its there, very annoying.

Also when the screen was flickering and i start playing, you can still see the taskbar flashing the whole time

replies.body:
There may be problems with your system drivers or hardware. I recommend working through the steps in our [bugsplat/crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) as a next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
